page.title: 12ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Among the interesting arts and crafts in the area are the following: { Mr Brown}from Barnton{makes armour for a hobby. He has been so successful that he now has customers in Britain and abroad who pay up to Â£200 for a knight in full armour. He learnt his skills as a teacher at ICI. { Mrs Stockton}has lived in Hartford for many years. She began{painting eighteen years ago. Now she holds lessons every winter in the village. Mrs Stockton does watercolours mainly. { The Cowburgh's}of Barnton use their hobby to raise funds for people who suffer from kidney failure or cancer. They{renovate old toys and dolls}to raise funds. So far they have made over six thousand pounds in seven and a half years.
